comment: A gorgeous drop. No over powering flavours or alcohol feel. A splash of water and this is a beautiful Scotch for any day.
Light flavor. No peat or smoke flavor. Good overall
Light, a tad floral, not peaty at all
Nothing I can clearly discern in the scent, but pleasant, soft and floral. Light, not overpowering flavour. A bit of a spicy finish. Very enjoyable and easy to drink.
Nose: definitely Sultanas Raisins. Taste: light smoke and sweet fruit. Soft finish.
